weekly_top5.name: Halliburton Company

target.bear_case_note: Geopolitical/oil-price impulse fades quickly (mean reversion in crude) and HAL fails to hold recent breakout area (near-term trend breaks below short MAs).

primary_catalyst.title: Geopolitical-driven oil volatility / Venezuela headlines supporting energy services bid
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Multiple same-week Venezuela-related headlines are driving crude volatility and a broad energy-services risk-on tape; HAL has elevated realized vol and strong trend, increasing odds of a further sharp continuation move if headlines persist.

sources.title: Chevron, Halliburton, Other Energy Shares Gain on Venezuela Windfall Hopes
The Venezuela News Lifted Some Oil Stocks. The Losers May Be Better Bets.

risk_factors: Catalyst is headline-driven (non-scheduled) and can reverse abruptly; high gap risk.
Energy beta: sharp crude pullback or de-escalation could unwind the move quickly.

weekly_top5.name: Axsome Therapeutics, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Post-FDA-news momentum mean-reverts; stock fails to hold the post-gap trend (breaks below short-term moving averages) and volatility compresses.

primary_catalyst.title: FDA regulatory milestones (Priority Review / dual FDA boosts) driving follow-through risk-on flows
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Recent FDA actions (priority review/acceptance) can extend multi-day momentum in biotech, especially with elevated realized volatility and strong volume, increasing probability of another sharp leg higher within a week.

sources.title: Why Axsome Therapeutics (AXSM) Is Up 17.5% After Dual FDA Boosts For AXS-05 And AXS-12 – And What's Next
AXSM Up on FDA Priority Review to AXS-05 sNDA in Alzheimer's Agitation

risk_factors: Biotech/regulatory headline risk; sharp reversals common after large FDA-driven gaps.
Very high short-term realized volatility increases both upside and drawdown probability.

weekly_top5.name: DigitalBridge Group, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Takeover narrative cools (no confirmatory filings/updates) and stock mean-reverts; downside accelerates if deal terms perceived as capped or delayed.

primary_catalyst.title: SoftBank acquisition / merger newsflow
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: M&A-driven tape can sustain multi-day momentum via deal-arb repricing and follow-on coverage; continued updates/analyst reactions can drive another sharp leg within a week, especially with high realized volatility.

sources.title: SoftBank to acquire DigitalBridge for $4bn in AI infrastructure push

risk_factors: Deal-arb dynamics can cap upside; analyst notes explicitly mention upside capped (timing/terms risk).
If acquisition terms are clarified as fixed-price, volatility may compress and reduce 10% upside odds.

weekly_top5.name: The Estée Lauder Companies Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Upgrade pop fades; stock stalls near prior supply and fails to make new highs, leading to pullback toward short MAs.

primary_catalyst.title: Analyst upgrade / Strong Buy call driving incremental demand
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: A high-conviction upgrade can trigger multi-day institutional repositioning and systematic momentum flows; with price near highs, a continuation breakout can produce a fast 10% move in a week if buying persists.

sources.title: Estee Lauder jumps as analyst upgrades the stock to Strong Buy

risk_factors: Lower realized volatility vs other candidates may reduce probability of a full 10% move in 7 trading days.
